petri.api

Class AnimatedImageActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • petri.api.Actor
      • petri.api.ImageActor
        • petri.api.AnimatedImageActor

  • public abstract class AnimatedImageActor
extends ImageActor
    An Actor that will change frames from a AnimatedImage while moving to display an animation.
    Author:
    Cody Swendrowski

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(int ms)
        Moves the Actor. Every call updates a timer. When this timer exceeds tileSpeed, advances the frame to the next horizontal frame. When it reaches the end of horizontal frames, advances 1 frame vertically and starts from left horizontally again.
        Overrides:
        move in class ImageActor
        Parameters:
        ms - Time since last call
